unnormalised: Doc said I've got a viral infection. Seriously? As if my daily commute on the Mumbai local wasn't already infectious enough. Gotta pop these antibiotics thrice a day for 7 days, or Dr. Sharma will give me a lecture!
normalised: Doc said I've got a viral infection. Seriously? As if my daily commute on the Mumbai local wasn't already infectious enough. Gotta pop these antibiotics thrice a day for seven days, or Doctor Sharma will give me a lecture!
